BlackBox.name: Clash.Explicit.DDR.ddrIn#
BlackBox.type:
ddrIn# :: forall a slow fast n pFast gated synchronous.
           ( HasCallStack          -- ARG[0]
           , Undefined a           -- ARG[1]
           , KnownDomain fast domf -- ARG[2]
           , KnownDomain slow doms -- ARG[3]
        => Clock slow              -- ARG[4], clk
        -> Reset slow              -- ARG[5], rst
        -> Enable slow             -- ARG[6], en
        -> a                       -- ARG[7]
        -> a                       -- ARG[8]
        -> a                       -- ARG[9]
        -> Signal fast a           -- ARG[10]
        -> Signal slow (a,a)

BlackBox.name: Clash.Explicit.DDR.ddrOut#
BlackBox.type:
ddrOut# :: ( HasCallStack               -- ARG[0]
            , Undefined a                -- ARG[1]
            , KnownDomain fast domf      -- ARG[2]
            , KnownDomain slow doms      -- ARG[3]
         => Clock slow                   -- ARG[4]
         -> Reset slow                   -- ARG[5]
         -> Enable slow                  -- ARG[6]
         -> a                            -- ARG[7]
         -> Signal slow a                -- ARG[8]
         -> Signal slow a                -- ARG[9]
         -> Signal fast a
